			 approval of lead counsel, the court shall employ a competitive bidding process
			 as one of the criteria in the selection and retention of counsel for the most
			 adequate plaintiff, unless the court determines on the record that such a
			 process is not feasible.

header.#text:
Study of average
			 hourly fees in securities class actions

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
(in
			 this section referred to as the
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Comptroller General of the United States

term.#tail:
) shall conduct
			 a study and review of fee awards to lead counsel in securities class actions
			 during the 7-year period preceding the date of enactment of this Act, to
			 determine the effective average hourly rate for lead counsel in such actions.
			 Such study and review shall also consider lead counsel perquisites, including
			 travel and accommodation.
